newsitem.title: JAPAN: S'tomo Metal stock up on news of gold drill result.
newsitem.headline: S'tomo Metal stock up on news of gold drill result.

text.p: Shares in Sumitomo Metal Mining Co rose on Friday morning, cheered by news of promising gold drilling results at a site in Alaska held by one of the company's U.S. subsidiaries.
The share price was up 29 yen at 800 yen at 0038 GMT. Volume was 1.11 million shares, making the share the 11th most heavily traded issue on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
The Metal Mining Agency of Japan has had promising gold drilling results at the site, Sumitomo Metal Mining said on Thursday.
